Articles.Content:
When you're left alone with nothing to do for several hours, you get bored. When you get bored, you try to find something fun to do. When you don't find something fun to do, you decide to just do something to occupy your mind. When that happens, things can get scary

Over 1200 parts and weighing in at approximately 380 kilotons |empty|, this is the new ore factory I built:

With this, we may gather the resources to build a death star. We will bring order to the galaxy! No, we'll probably just get bored with it after a while

Honestly the only reason this is here is because I need an ego, so here we are. You can never have too much fun when it comes to ore. The question I raise is: How exactly is one to use this? It's big and bulky, it can't move |trust me I tried|, and it needs others to make it work. Oh, and if you want it for "testing", I'll have it delivered to you along with an appointment to a therapist close to you 

Edited July 11, 2016 by Xannari Ferrows
Teleport it to the Mun and then turn the Mun into a death star.

I take it that this is some of the stuff you do when I go offline to sleep to go to class?
